fields.day_1: Chest - Press ups, bench press and cable flys
fields.day_2: Back - Weughted row, barbell row and lat pull down
fields.day_3: Legs - Font squat, back squat andcalf raises
fields.day_4: Shoulders - Shoulder press, handstand press ups and straight arm raises
fields.day_5: Arms - Bicep curl, Tripcep curl and tricep
fields.day_6: Cardio - 1 minute run, 1 minute skip and 1 minute row 3 times
fields.day_7: Stretch and recovery - Recover body and stretch out the muscles
